source.query: sandbag crush grip press muscles worked
source.raw_text:
The Sandbag Crush Press primarily targets your chest (pectorals), shoulders (anterior deltoids), and triceps, working in a pressing/pushing pattern with significant core stabilization due to the unstable weight, engaging stabilizers and teaching proper shoulder/core coordination by forcing you to "crush" or "rip" the bag apart to maintain tension, much like a heavy dumbbell bench press but with added instability. [1, 2, 3, 4]  
Muscles Worked 

• Primary Movers: Pectoralis Major (chest), Anterior Deltoids (front shoulders), Triceps Brachii (back of arms). 
• Stabilizers: Core (abdominals, obliques, erector spinae), Lats, Rotator Cuff. [2, 3, 4, 5, 6]  

Movement Pattern & Key Focus 

1. Setup: Start with the sandbag on your lap (for floor press) or front rack position (for standing press), feet stable. 
2. Pressing Motion: Press the bag upward (or overhead), similar to a dumbbell press, but with a key difference: you actively squeeze the bag, trying to pull it apart or "crush" it. 
3. Coordination: This "crush" action creates tension, teaching your lats and core to stabilize the shoulder joint, preventing the elbows from flaring out and shoulders from rounding forward, a common issue in traditional presses. 
4. Dynamic Instability: The shifting weight forces constant muscle recruitment, making it a more functional movement that improves mind-muscle connection and overall stability. [2, 4, 5, 7, 8]  

Variations (for context) 

• Floor Press: Lying on your back, pressing up from the floor, emphasizing chest and triceps. 
• Overhead Press: From a front rack, pressing the bag overhead, engaging more shoulders, core, and legs for stability. [2, 7, 9]  

**Citations:**

[1] https://www.muscleandstrength.com/exercises/close-grip-dumbbell-press.html
[2] https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rV-3Q6ZYz5g
[3] https://www.boxrox.com/5-sandbag-exercises-for-a-jacked-and-strong-upper-body/
[4] https://ultimatesandbagtraining.com/muscles-made-smarter-ultimate-sandbag-exercises/
[5] https://redefiningstrength.com/13-sandbag-exercises-full-body-workout/
[6] https://www.facebook.com/muscleandmotion/videos/shoulder-to-shoulder-thruster-with-sandbagthis-exercise-is-a-variation-of-the-th/647480079901789/?locale=ms_MY
[7] https://www.setforset.com/blogs/news/sandbag-workouts
[8] https://www.setforset.com/blogs/news/sandbag-training-benefits
[9] https://www.muscletech.com/blogs/journal/sandbag-workout
